oldentry: Popular explanation: spots on one's body.
verblex: 1. To have small, light brown spots on your skin, especially on your face. English = have freckles, (be) freckled.
2. To have a lot of pimples, especially on your face. English = (be) pimply, (be) spotty.
nomlex: 1. Small, light brown spots on someone's skin, especially on their face. English = freckles.
2. Small red spots, especially on your face. English = pimples, spots.
